annotations.description: We have been watching a lacklustre game with only a few moments to excite the crowd. The players surely have better abilities, they just needed to motivate themselves a little more. Neither of the teams could take the initiative and dominate today's game. Both sides tried to combine well and to keep the ball at their feet.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be no more action in this match as the referee signals full time.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Anderson Talisca (Benfica) is cleared.

Benfica keep the ball well and push forward with purpose, but here comes an interception from the opposition. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Benfica will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
Sebastian Boenisch (Bayer Leverkusen) sends a cross into the box, but Artur comes off his line to gather the ball.
Joao Teixeira (Benfica) receives a pass and fires a shot in from long range, but it's blocked.

annotations.label: yr-card
annotations.description: Aleksei Kulbakov blows his whistle and Omer Toprak (Bayer Leverkusen) is shown a second yellow card for his foul. His manager will not be pleased. He has lot of time to think about it as he walks off.

annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 5 min. of added time.

Pizzi (Benfica) dinks a cross into the box in an attempt to find one of his teammates, but the defence manages to clear.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Joao Teixeira (Benfica) is coming onto the pitch as Bebe cannot continue after picking up an injury.
Cesar (Benfica) was the quickest one to orientate himself inside the box and rose high to reach a fine corner kick. He fails to direct the ball past the goalkeeper as it flies narrowly over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Benfica.
Bebe (Benfica) receives a sweet pass inside the box, but his effort on goal is blocked by the defender.

Karim Bellarabi (Bayer Leverkusen) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.

Anderson Talisca (Benfica) produces a ferocious strike from the edge of the box. His dangerous effort towards the bottom left corner is blocked by Bernd Leno, who pulls off a superb save to keep the ball out of the net.

Anderson Talisca (Benfica) hasn't suffered any serious injury which would see him leave the pitch. He's back in the game now.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Emir Spahic (Bayer Leverkusen) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

Anderson Talisca (Benfica) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went low towards the middle of the target, but Bernd Leno was alert and the score remained the same.

annotations.description: Gonzalo Castro (Bayer Leverkusen) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.

A precise low pass is received by Roberto Hilbert (Bayer Leverkusen), who makes a yard for himself on the edge of the box, but his poorly placed shot sails well wide of the left post.
Aleksei Kulbakov couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Bebe (Benfica) and blew his whistle.
Wow, what an escape. Josip Drmic (Bayer Leverkusen) has an effort from inside the box but it's brilliantly blocked.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The players are back out on the pitch following the half time break and the second half is about to start.

We are watching a run of the mill game with only a few moments to ignite the crowd. The players surely can surely perform better, they just need to motivate themselves. Even first half from both sides, and they've both had chances. Pass and move. The home side have played some possession football so far, while the visitors have been patient as they wait for the right moment to hit them on the break.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: Before the start of the game, you can see the starting lineups for today's clash.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.

We have been watching a lacklustre game with only a few moments to excite the crowd. The players surely have better abilities, they just needed to motivate themselves a little more. Neither of the teams could take the initiative and dominate today's game. Both sides tried to combine well and to keep the ball at their feet.
